front.title: Problem Statement about IPv6 Support for Multiple Routers, Multiple Interfaces, and Multiple Prefixes

abstract.t: This document discusses current limitations in IPv6 Stateless Address Auto-configuration (SLAAC) that prevent support for common multi- router, multi-interface, and multi-prefix scenarios. It provides discussion on the challenges that these scenarios represent, and why a solution in this space is warranted. Finally, it specifies a number of common scenarios that any solution in this space should be able to address.
